City Sponsored Events
=====================

* City Events



**All City Events are held at City Hall
For more information on City Sponsored Events please contact the City Secretary at (210) 581-1116**

**City Event Calendar for 2026**

|  |  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **Event** | **Date** | **Time** | **Location** |
| **[ARBOR / EARTH DAY](http://www.shavanoparktx.gov/residents/arborday.php)** | **APRIL 11, 2026** | **10AM - 1PM** | **CITY HALL GROUNDS** |
| **[INDEPENDENCE DAY](http://www.shavanoparktx.gov/residents/independenceday.php)** | **JUNE 27, 2026** | **10AM - 1PM** | **CITY HALL GROUNDS** |
| **[NATIONAL NIGHT OUT](http://www.shavanoparktx.gov/residents/nationalnightout.php)** | **OCTOBER 6, 2026** | **6PM - 8PM** | **CITY HALL GROUNDS** |
| **[TRUNK OR TREAT](http://www.shavanoparktx.gov/residents/trunkortreat.php)** | **OCTOBER 25, 2026** | **4PM - 6PM** | **CITY HALL GROUNDS** |
| **[HOLIDAY FESTIVAL](http://www.shavanoparktx.gov/residents/holidayevent.php)** | **DECEMBER 5, 2026** | **3PM - 6PM** | **CITY HALL GROUNDS** |
